card.title: Cashamm E-Commerce
card.subtitle: Empowering Economic Justice Through Design
card.description: Community-centered commerce platform empowering Black-owned businesses to thrive online.

projectSummary.overview: Designed community-first e-commerce platform for Black-owned businesses. Platform prioritizes vendor discovery and provides accessible tools for merchants.

items.title: Lower Barriers
items.description: Make it easy for Black-owned businesses to establish online presence

items.title: Build Community
items.description: Create sense of belonging and shared mission

items.title: Enable Empowerment
items.description: Provide tools for businesses to scale and thrive
